Name: TWO MONTHS
About the game: TWO MONTHS is a souls-like action RPG adaptation of one man's struggle to develop the ultimate handheld computing device. This is a faithful retelling of his two month journey. Features: Sword & shield combat inspired by the Souls series A unique, highly configurable level-up system that lets you choose your playstyle e.g. glass cannon, evasion, blocking, regen or a mix of everything Interconnected level design with lots of secret areas, shortcuts and environmental hazards. 8 - 12 hours on average to complete on a first playthrough depending on skill level Challenging bosses Retro soundtrack by Filippo Vicarelli
